notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Control when and how you receive notifications

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your language and region preferences

voice.title: Voice & Video
voice.subtitle: Configure your audio and video settings for voice channels

input.title: Input Device
input.description: Configure your microphone and input settings

microphone.testHint: Click to test your microphone input
microphone.testHintActive: Speak to see your microphone levels and hear yourself

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose between light and dark mode

time.title: Time Format
time.description: Choose how times are displayed in chat

zoom.title: Zoom Level
zoom.description: Scale the interface to your preference

chat.subtitle: Customize your chat and messaging experience

emoji.title: Emoji Settings
emoji.description: Adjust how emoji-only messages are displayed

typing.title: Typing Indicators
typing.description: Control typing indicator visibility and sending

content.subtitle: Control your content filtering and social interactions
content.comingSoonDesc: Content filtering and social interaction settings will be available here.

privacy.subtitle: Manage your data and privacy preferences
privacy.comingSoonDesc: Data export, privacy controls, and account data management will be available here.

export.title: Export My Data
export.description: Download a JSON snapshot of your local app settings.
export.hint: Includes keybinds, audio, notifications, UI sounds, locale, mutes, and more. Excludes access tokens.

clear.title: Clear Local App Data
clear.description: Remove locally stored preferences from this device. Does not log you out.
clear.confirm: Clear local app data on this device? This cannot be undone.

devices.subtitle: Manage your connected devices and sessions
devices.comingSoonDesc: Device management, active sessions, and two-factor authentication will be available here.

device.title: Device Management
device.description: Name this device and mark it as trusted (local-only).
device.name: Device name
device.trustedHint: Skip some prompts on this device

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: These are your login sessions across devices.
sessions.confirmSignOutAll: Sign out of all devices? This will revoke all active sessions.
sessions.doneSignOutAll: All devices have been signed out.

2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
2fa.description: Protect your account with an additional verification step.
2fa.comingSoon: TOTP setup and recovery codes will be available soon.

account.subtitle: Manage your account details and security

password.title: Change Password
password.hint: Use a strong password between 6 and 20 characters.
password.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.warning: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data.
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Update how you appear to others

info.title: Profile Information
info.subtitle: Manage your display name and avatar

avatar.clickToChange: Click on the image to change
avatar.hint: JPG, PNG, GIF or WEBP up to 8MB

fields.displayNameHelp: This is how you'll appear to other users in servers and direct messages.

sounds.title: UI Sounds
sounds.subtitle: Enable and adjust sounds for common actions
